conbody.codeblock:
name: 'Katalon-Studio' description: 'Execute Katalon Studio projects' inputs: version: description: 'Which version of Katalon Studio to run' required: true default: ''
projectPath: description: 'Where the Katalon Studio project is checked out' required: true default: ''
args: description: 'What arguments to run Katalon Studio project' required: true default: ''
runs: using: 'node12' main: 'index.js'
